titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 2,6-Bis(2,4-dihydroxybenzyl)-p-cresol ester with 6-diazo-5,6-dihydro-5-oxo-1-naphthalnenesulfonic acid and methane sulfonic acid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 2,6-Bis(2,4-dihydroxybenzyl)-p-cresol ester with 6-diazo-5,6-dihydro-5-oxo-1-naphthalnenesulfonic acid and methane sulfonic acid.
